name: Saurusland
overview: Saurusland is an early simulator of life in the paleolithic age, putting you as a blocky-pixeled caveman in a (non-scrolling) landscape filled with volatile volcanos, moles, mammoths and tyrannosaurs. Dodge the animals, or use your club to kill them for points. After a minute of play, the volcanos erupt, and you must dodge the falling lava.
